verses.verse: <S%H7121>Call<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> if there be any that will <S%H6030>answer<s%> you; and to <S%H4310>which<s%> of the <S%H6918>saints<s%> will you <S%H6437>turn?<s%>
For <S%H3708>wrath<s%> <S%H2026>kills<s%> the <S%H191>foolish<s%> man, and <S%H7068>envy<s%> <S%H4191>slays<s%> the <S%H6601>silly<s%> one.
I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H191>foolish<s%> taking <S%H8327>root:<s%> but <S%H6597>suddenly<s%> I <S%H5344>cursed<s%> his <S%H5116>habitation.<s%>
His <S%H1121>children<s%> are <S%H7350>far<s%> from <S%H3468>safety,<s%> and they are <S%H1792>crushed<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> <S%H369>neither<s%> is there any to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> them.

<S%H834>Whose<s%> <S%H7105>harvest<s%> the <S%H7456>hungry<s%> <S%H398>eats<s%> up, and <S%H3947>takes<s%> it even out of the <S%H6791>thorns,<s%> and the <S%H6782>robber<s%> <S%H7602>swallows<s%> up their <S%H2428>substance.<s%>

<S%H3588>Although<s%> <S%H205>affliction<s%> <S%H3318>comes<s%> not <S%H3318>forth<s%> of the <S%H6083>dust,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> does <S%H5999>trouble<s%> <S%H6779>spring<s%> out of the <S%H127>ground;<s%>
<S%H3588>Yet<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> is <S%H3205>born<s%> to <S%H5999>trouble,<s%> as the <S%H1121>sparks<s%> <S%H7565><s%> <S%H5774>fly<s%> <S%H1361>upward.<s%>
I would <S%H1875>seek<s%> to <S%H410>God,<s%> and to <S%H430>God<s%> would I <S%H7760>commit<s%> my <S%H1700>cause:<s%>
Which <S%H6213>does<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> things and <S%H369>unsearchable;<s%> <S%H2714><s%> <S%H6381>marvelous<s%> things <S%H5704>without<s%> <S%H369><s%> <S%H4557>number:<s%>
Who <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H4306>rain<s%> on the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H7971>sends<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%> on the <S%H2351>fields:<s%>
To <S%H7760>set<s%> up on <S%H4791>high<s%> those that be <S%H8217>low;<s%> that those which <S%H6937>mourn<s%> may be <S%H7682>exalted<s%> to <S%H3468>safety.<s%>
He <S%H6565>disappoints<s%> the <S%H4284>devices<s%> of the <S%H6175>crafty,<s%> so that their <S%H3027>hands<s%> <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H3201><s%> perform their <S%H8454>enterprise.<s%>
He <S%H3920>takes<s%> the <S%H2450>wise<s%> in their own <S%H6193>craftiness:<s%> and the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of the <S%H6617>fraudulent<s%> is <S%H4116>carried<s%> headlong.
They <S%H6298>meet<s%> with <S%H2822>darkness<s%> in the day <S%H3119>time,<s%> and <S%H4959>grope<s%> in the <S%H6672>noonday<s%> as in the <S%H3915>night.<s%>
But he <S%H3467>saves<s%> the <S%H34>poor<s%> from the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> from their <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H2389>mighty.<s%>
So the <S%H1800>poor<s%> <S%H1961>has<s%> <S%H8615>hope,<s%> and <S%H5766>iniquity<s%> <S%H7092>stops<s%> her <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>

<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> <S%H835>happy<s%> is the <S%H582>man<s%> whom <S%H433>God<s%> <S%H3198>corrects:<s%> therefore <S%H3988>despise<s%> not you the <S%H4148>chastening<s%> of the <S%H7706>Almighty:<s%>
For he makes <S%H3510>sore,<s%> and <S%H2280>binds<s%> up: he <S%H4272>wounds,<s%> and his <S%H3027>hands<s%> make <S%H7495>whole.<s%>
He shall <S%H5337>deliver<s%> you in <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H6869>troubles:<s%> yes, in <S%H7651>seven<s%> there shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H5060>touch<s%> you.
In <S%H7458>famine<s%> he shall <S%H6299>redeem<s%> you from <S%H4194>death:<s%> and in <S%H4421>war<s%> from the <S%H3027>power<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

You shall be <S%H2244>hid<s%> from the <S%H7752>whip<s%> of the <S%H3956>tongue:<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall you be <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of <S%H7701>destruction<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> it <S%H935>comes.<s%>
At <S%H7701>destruction<s%> and <S%H3720>famine<s%> you shall <S%H7832>laugh:<s%> <S%H408>neither<s%> shall you be <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
For you shall be in <S%H1285>league<s%> with the <S%H68>stones<s%> of the <S%H7704>field:<s%> and the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> shall be at <S%H7999>peace<s%> with you.
And you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that your <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> shall be in <S%H7965>peace;<s%> and you shall <S%H6485>visit<s%> your <S%H5116>habitation,<s%> and shall not <S%H2398>sin.<s%>
You shall <S%H3045>know<s%> also that your <S%H2233>seed<s%> shall be <S%H7227>great,<s%> and your <S%H6631>offspring<s%> as the <S%H6212>grass<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
You shall <S%H935>come<s%> to your <S%H6913>grave<s%> in a <S%H3624>full<s%> <S%H3624>age,<s%> like as a <S%H1430>shock<s%> of corn <S%H5927>comes<s%> in in his <S%H6256>season.<s%>
<S%H2009>See<s%> <S%H2063>this,<s%> we have <S%H2713>searched<s%> it, <S%H3651>so<s%> it is; <S%H8085>hear<s%> it, and <S%H3045>know<s%> you it for your <S%H2896>good.<s%>
